Title: Joyeux Noel
Overview: France, 1914, during World War I. On Christmas Eve, an extraordinary event takes place in the bloody no man's land that the French and the Scots dispute with the Germans…
Tagline: Without an enemy there can be no war.
production_companies: Senator Film Produktion, Media Pro Pictures, TF1 Films Production, Nord-Ouest Productions, The Bureau, Artémis Productions, Les Productions de la Guéville
Cast: Diane Kruger, Natalie Dessay, Benno Fürmann
